headline: Assessing Citigroup (C) Valuation: Is There More Room to Run After Recent Gains?
summary: Citigroup (C) shares have drawn renewed interest among investors as the stock continues to move within a defined range over the past month. Recent performance shows modest gains year to date, with a notable uptick over the past three months. See our latest analysis for Citigroup. Citigroup’s share price is showing real momentum, supported by recent gains and a year-to-date share price return of 44.4 percent. headline: Citi And Coinbase Partner To Modernize Institutional Payments
summary: Citi and Coinbase have partnered to make it easier for financial institutions to use digital assets for payments. The initial focus will be to simplify how money moves between traditional fiat currency and crypto. headline: Citi CEO Fraser on Private Credit: Is It a Tug of War or a Team Sport?
summary: Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser, speaking during a panel discussion at the Future Investment Initiative in Saudi Arabia, struck a tone of skepticism and uncertainty on what's ahead for the private credit market, asking: "Is this a tug of war or a team sport?" It's her hope, she said, that private credit will emerge a team player and work together with other forms of financing to offer more solutions that can drive development in things like AI.

headline: Citi Taps Coinbase in Push to Modernize Institutional Payments With Digital Assets
summary: Citi and Coinbase plan to develop digital asset payment capabilities for institutional clients, a move that brings Wall Street plumbing closer to on-chain money.The collaboration will focus first on making it easier to move between fiat and crypto, then broaden into payments orchestration for always-on settlement.The initial work targets fiat ...
